name: CakezTD Demo
description:
Cakez TD (Demo, free)

This is a free Demo for my game Cakez TD, download and play all you like. Any feedback is greatly appreciated. You can either comment here, or you can post any suggestions on Discord: https://discord.gg/JSVraGd8cz

Thanks for playing!

  • 5 Missions to play
  • Leveling 4 different Heroes(Towers)
  • Train up to 8 out of 22 Skills
  • Add behaviour Rules to Heroes(Tactics "T")
  • 7 different Enemy Types
  • Platform (Windows)
  • Press "Shift" for "Fullscreen"
